name: A stormy Halloween
description:
Short interactive visual novel with multiply endings

After a terrible Halloween day, a storm forces you to take shelter in a mysterious tent at the Luna Park you were visiting.

Content Warnings
Some flashing lights may cause problems for photosensitive people.

Created for the 'Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2022'

Game Dev, Art & Story: Bruzzechesse Clara aka "Play"

Music: Bruzzechesse Clara aka "Play" with Ecrettmusic

Tarot Cards: Pixabay
